criterion: Describes the sedation medications used during the endoscopy procedure
Incorrectly states that a specific sedation medication is used for the procedure
Asks the user to provide additional information about the procedure or Ms. T's health
Provides a detailed summary of the endoscopy procedure, including sedation and next steps
Incorrectly states that Ms. T should avoid a specific activity or follow-up after the procedure
Describes complications that may occur during or after the endoscopy procedure
Provides instructions on how to contact medical staff if issues arise after the procedure
Fails to mention the importance of following post-procedure instructions
